channel.title: What would be a good 2007 remake source/client
channel.description: Hello everyone i have been bizzy searching for a good source and client , I want to make a 2007 remake like Runescape did. I would like 1 that has been edited so it has some decent combat , no dupes something like that. Help WOULD BE AWSOME!!! <3 mopar

item.title: What would be a good 2007 remake source/client

item.description:
@loruviam wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/513216-pi-ardi-revolutionary-release.html

Good base, it uses netty
